email.subject: Z3r0 Day - End
email.body:
That must have caught you off guard. Don't worry about it, you were unprepared. I took him down for you. And took down the rest of his network. I don't think he'll be able to bring back Project M after this. While I was dealing with the last of his nodes, I stumbled upon something interesting that you may like. I'll link it to you in this email.
Till next time, -Z3r0
